question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 1.5 for terminal 4 and the positive terminal.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminal 4 and the positive terminal are separated by the gap

terminal 4 is connected to the negative battery terminal
terminal 4 is not separated from the negative battery terminal
Terminal 4 and the positive battery terminal are in different electrical states
